Lyric:
[00:08.300]Hello.
[00:10.300]Is there anybody in there?
[00:14.300]Just nod if you can hear me.
[00:18.300]Is there anyone home?
[00:22.300]Come on, now.
[00:25.300]I hear you're feeling down.
[00:29.300]Well I can ease your pain,
[00:33.299]Get you on your feet again.
[00:38.299]Relax.
[00:40.299]I need some information first.
[00:45.299]Just the basic facts:
[00:48.299]Can you show me where it hurts?
[00:53.299]There is no pain, you are receding.
[01:00.899]A distant ship's smoke on the horizon.
[01:09.899]You are only coming through in waves.
[01:16.899]Your lips move but I can't hear what you're sayin'.
[01:22.899]When I was a child I had a fever.
[01:30.899]My hands felt just like two balloons.
[01:38.899]Now I got that feeling once again.
[01:43.899]I can't explain, you would not understand.
[01:48.899]This is not how I am.
[01:56.390]I have become comfortably numb.
[02:47.500]Ok.
[02:50.500]Just a little pinprick. 
[02:54.500]There'll be no more --Aaaaaahhhhh!
[02:58.500]But you may feel a little sick.
[03:02.500]Can you stand up?
[03:05.500]I do believe it's working. Good.
[03:09.500]That'll keep you going for the show.
[03:13.500]Come on it's time to go.
[03:18.500]There is no pain, you are receding.
[03:25.500]A distant ship's smoke on the horizon.
[03:33.500]You are only coming through in waves.
[03:40.500]Your lips move but I can't hear what you're sayin'.
[03:48.500]When I was a child I caught a fleeting glimpse,
[03:56.500]Out of the corner of my eye.
[04:03.500]I turned to look but it was gone.
[04:08.500]I cannot put my finger on it now.
[04:12.500]The child is grown, the dream is gone.
[04:18.500]I have become comfortably numb.
